h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 3
content: The next material location can be found by defeating Guangmou along the main path in the Bamboo Grove \- Snake Trail location in Black Wind Mountain.

The content is as follows:
The next material location can be found by defeating Guangmou along the main path in the Bamboo Grove \- Snake Trail location in Black Wind Mountain.
